post.body: how long are you in town for? Got free time to meet up this week?
what a slacker, that @kmackenney. Still delayed at the airport?
if the warm weather keeps up, I'm game this winter.
You and the wife available to meet up tonite, dessert & drinks perhaps?
A 2 wk break & a wknd of home cooking is going to make todays workout brutal.
The Dark Knight a second time = still amazing!
Home sweet home. Now, let the unpacking begin.
Heading home with more luggage than we arrived with. Most of it food courtesy of mom.
Streak O'lean = deep fried fatback ... Only in NC... http://twitpic.com/wzuf
Bfast with Dave at the Farmers Market restaurant. Nothing like good ol' southern cooking in the morning.
Watched 3 hrs of Cesar Millan, the dog Whisperer, tonite and now the wife wants to "rehabilitate" me to into a submissive state of mind.
I forgot how much north carolinians love their sports team car decals. unc, duke, ncsu stickers abound!
Boj: rd 2. My pops looks so happy to be here! http://twitpic.com/wpoj
Costco and Grand Asia run with the 'rents.
I felt like I truly relaxed for the 1st time in awhile today. Being spoiled by mom has a way of doing that to a person.
sitting on my bum ...merry christmas to you!
Helping the 'rents fill out their living wills today. Talk about a morbid way to spend Christmas day.
Gone searching for a drug store and coffee shop still open on Xmas day.
Wishing you a balmy 65, slighty overcast Xmas. At least that's what the weather is like in NC.
All the Chinese restaurants are still open on Xmas eve in Cary, NC.
